message: Let's split it evenly, no need to overthink it!
You wanted to split it evenly, but I think I deserve more for being the first to propose!
You think you deserve more? I'll give you a slightly larger share, but don't get too comfortable!
You're getting desperate, aren't you? I'll give you a smaller share, but you'll still be left with a decent amount!
You think you're being generous, but I'm not impressed. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're not going down without a fight? I'll give you a tiny share, but you'll be begging for mercy by round 10!
You think you're being ruthless, but I'm not going to beg. I'll give you a slightly larger share, but don't think this is the end of the game!
You think you're being merciful? I'll take what I can get, but you're going to regret this!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but don't think this is a sign of weakness!
You think you're being generous? I'll take the last crumbs, but you're going to be left with nothing!
I'm not going to beg, Bob. I'll take nothing rather than accept this insult. You can have it all, but don't think you've won!
